description:
This an open soure and free tool and without any warranties. 

This tool greatly simplifies snapshotting and restoring EBS volumes attached to an EC2 instance.

This tool is designed to run ON THE EC2 INSTANCE that requires snapshotting of EBS volumes. 

Please refer to the wiki (https://github.com/cloudoman/snapshotter/wiki) for more details.
summary: Amazon EBS Volume Snapshot Backup Tool for Windows By Cloudoman (http://cloudoman.com/).
author: Ameer Deen
